titles.title: To commend the Aircraft Owners and Pilots Association on its proactive commitment to the security of general aviation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 3/4/2003--Introduced. Commends the Aircraft Owners and Pilots Association for its excellence in taking proactive measures to solve the Nations's new security challenges and for partnering with the Transportation Security Administration and the Federal Aviation Administration to create immediate, innovative, and common sense solutions to such challenges.
